Summary: Riding in car - saw off in distance
divs: Sighting DetailsRight after the sun set - driving West, glanced up into western sky - one bright star was in the sky - sky was getting dark, sun had gone down a few moments before, saw a bright (brighter than star) white cigar-shaped almost like looking at an airplane wing head on - it was at a 30 degree angle in the sky and much larger than the star. I looked back down then glanced back up again and it very quickly it shrunk in size (same size as star) and disapeared quickly. When I first saw it I thought it was a comet. The reason I noticed it was because of its shape and brightness. My reaction was amazement. My brother and I were going somewhere and I pointed it out to him so he saw it too.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Branson
There were no other sightings in Branson on or around July 17th 2007
